page.title: 17A policeman's day in Dalston
page.content: running away from the house and chased after them he caught 2 boys at Craikgarth and then asked Carlisle police station to get the builder to come to the house and see if the boys had done any harm. 8.15pm The builder checked the house the boys hadn't done any damage. Mr Blaire took the boys to their house and told them off in front of there parents they told Mr Blaire where the other boys lived and told them off in front of their parents. 8.45 Mr Blaire checked Sowerby wood to see if any people had been poaching deer.There used to be over 100 deer in Sowerby wood but there's only about 6 deer left. (see page 12)
